hero.title: Seekhiye, Practice Kariye, Protected Rahiye: Aapka AI-Powered Investment Saathi
hero.subtitle: AI-powered fraud detection aur complete financial education ka combination. Market ke basics samjhiye, virtual trading mein practice kariye, aur scams se bachiyeâ€”sab kuch ek saath, sirf Indian investors ke liye banaya gaya.

agents.title: AI-Powered Fraud Detection Agents
agents.subtitle: Hamare advanced AI agents ko test kariye jo investors ko har tarah ke financial fraud se real-time mein protect karte hain.

services.title: Hamein numbers handle karne dein, taaki aap apni success handle kar sakein.

feature1Description: Nifty aur Sensex ke basics se lekar advanced technical analysis tak, hamare courses Indian market ke liye taiyar kiye gaye hain.
feature2Description: SEBI ke latest regulations ke baare mein informed rahein, aam investment scams ko samjhein, aur apne portfolio ko protect karna seekhein.
feature3Description: Bina kisi capital risk ke real-time simulated environment mein apni trading strategies practice karein. Risk-free trading ki kala mein master banein.
analyzerTitle: Kisi bhi financial message par turant clarity paayein
heroSubtitle: Financial education, fraud detection, aur virtual trading ke liye aapka AI-powered guide. Indian investors ko smarter, safer decisions lene mein empower karna.

analyzer.placeholder: Fraud check karne ke liye koi bhi message, email, ya link yahan paste karein. Jaise ki: 'Badhai ho! Aapne ek inaam jeeta hai. Claim karne ke liye http://suspicious-link.com par click karein.' Hum aapke liye iska analysis karenge.

error.noContent: Kripya analyze karne ke liye kuch content provide karein.
error.analysisFailed: Analysis ke dauraan ek error hua.
error.connectionFailed: Analysis service se connect hone mein fail hua.

journey.title: Aapki Smart Investing Ki Journey
journey.subtitle: Minutes mein start kariye aur ek confident investor banne ka raasta shuru kariye

step1.title: Free Sign Up Kariye
step1.description: 30 seconds mein apna account banayiye. Credit card ki zarurat nahi.

step2.title: Messages Verify Kariye
step2.description: Suspicious investment offers ko instantly check karne ke liye hamara AI use kariye.

step3.title: Market Basics Seekhiye
step3.description: Stock market ke fundamentals aur trading strategies ko samjhiye.

step4.title: Trading Practice Kariye
step4.description: Real market conditions mein virtual money use karke practice kariye.

step5.title: Confidence Ke Saath Invest Kariye
step5.description: Informed investment decisions lene ke liye apna knowledge apply kariye.

journey.readyText: Apni investment journey start karne ke liye ready hain?
